function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unreviewed articles","Impact":"Inaccurate information may be used for inference","Mitigation":"Wait for peer review or corroborate with other sources","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Readers, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Researchers, publishers, peer reviewers"},{"Description":"Confounding variables impact on disease spread","Impact":"Misinterpretation of disease spread factors","Mitigation":"Perform meta-analysis, control for confounding variables in studies","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, meta-analysis software","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Researchers, research institutions, health organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of bias in included studies","Impact":"Reduced trust in study results and conclusions","Mitigation":"Improve study design, address confounding factors, use appropriate statistical analysis","Technologies":"Research methodology and statistical analysis tools","People":"Researchers, readers, policymakers","Owner":"Researchers, research institutions, peer reviewers"}]}
